item.name: config
item.item: ↑ Use this field if you have good cron knowledge.

item.name: tooltip
item.item: Select a Magento 2 event to automatically run export jobs upon its trigger.

item.name: tooltip
item.item: Additional attributes will be split into the separate columns.

item.name: config
tooltip
item.item: After the selected entity is exported, every consecutive export job run will only export the entities added since the latest job run.
Export only new items after latest job execution

item.name: tooltip
item.item: Only products and categories with default store view values will be exported.

item.name: tooltip
item.item: Defines if export job should process entities in batches of ‘Page size’ value.

item.name: tooltip
item.item: Defines how many entities at once should export job process.

settings.label: Mapping feature allows you to set the conformity between custom data structure and Magento 2 fields. Entity - source of system attribute; System Attribute - select system attributes that should be mapped to custom attributes; Export Attributes - specify custom attributes; DefaultValued - add hardcoded values if necessary.

item.name: config
item.item: Filters allow you to import / export only specific entities which match configured filter conditions.
